name: Trinity Healthcare Development
overview:
Trinity Healthcare Partners presents a unique business model that creates an on-going relationship with physicians. With our background and experience Trintiy is uniquely positioned to a multitude of services to it physicain partners.

Our team has a background in development, finance, practice management, medical insurance recovery, STARK Laws, compliance, billing, and the hot topic of EMR. We believe the commitment by a physician in one of our buildings should go beyond their lease and we provide the resources to help sustain or take their practice to the next level.

funding_round.source_description: NC IDEA & WIN Lead $3 Million Funding for Affinergy's Medical Device Coatings
